description: Numbers k such that p1 = prime(k) + prime(k+1) + prime(k+2), p2 = p1 + prime(k+3) + prime(k+4), p3 = p2 + prime(k+5) + prime(k+6), p4 = p3 + prime(k+7) + prime(k+8), p5 = p4 + prime(k+9) + prime(k+10), p6 = p5 + prime(k+11) + prime(k+12), p7 = p6 + prime(k+13) + prime(k+14) and p8 = p7 + prime(k+15) + prime(k+16) are all prime
